::Battera::

She could feel the  gun against her head. "My name is Battera. Please 
put the gun down. I mean no harm nore am I looking for a fight. I am 
on a mission." With the gun to her head she would have little 
reaction time to put up a fight.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Ignore what Inferno said, for some reason he had no idea there was 
a 
> deceased list, hehe.  There is in fact a deceased list)
> 
> Imprisoner/Predator/Choran/Chordate:
> 
> 
> 
> Imprisoner, Predator, and Choran ran, signatures to close for 
comfort, 
> Predator firing a grenade from behind him at Hot Rod's tail pipe.
> 
> Running through the thick forest, two missiles passed by, exploding 
close, 
> sending dirt and some shrapnel into the three bounty hunter's 
faces.  They 
> continued onward as quick as they could go.
> 
> Predator went to his beast mode, the pain being subdued, the good 
clawing 
> Savanna gave to him excruciatingly painful.
> 
> ===
> 
> Chordate aimed his laser rifle at the back of Barrett's head, 
finger on the 
> trigger.
> "Identify yourself, or else I activate the autoguns and blow you 
back to the 
> rebellion against the Quintessons, understand?"
